name: Chubbs' Adventure Demo
description:
Guide Chubbs to the portal for each level while making sure to never cross back over the way you came. Learn to handle the 

A/D - Move Left/Right

Space - Jump

A short demo for a puzzle platformer made in 48 hours for a local game jam. I'm planning on expanding it in the near future and made this page to allow me to share it with people before starting to work on it full time.
